name: The Border Guard
description:
You're a border guard. Your only job is to make sure that nothing passes through you.

LMOB Game Jam

This is my first game to be uploaded.

If you're a 3d artist and liked the project plz contact me.

Gun:https://devassets.com/assets/multiplayer-fps-assets/

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

Right Mouse Click - toggle aim

Left shift - run

Space - Jump

F - Interact

G - Continue Dialog
